short_desc: The Oakland Police Department has established a gun tip line designed to address the possession, use, and supply of firearms to intimidate, assault, and commit illegal acts in the community. Calls made to the tip line will be considered confidential if the caller wishes to remain anonymous
description: In collaboration with the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms, and Explosives (ATF), the Oakland Police Department has established a gun tip line designed to address the possession, use, and supply of firearms to intimidate, assault, and commit illegal acts in the community. Calls made to the tip line will be considered confidential if the caller wishes to remain anonymous. ATF will pay up to $5,000 for information leading to the arrest and prosecution of those responsible for firearms-related homicides and/or violence.
